Text: This DL is garbage. once you exit the game, you lose any and ALL progress you made. Same with his other mahjong download - Mahjong AC

I personally downloaded this and had no problems. Just unzip as you desire and run MahJongEscapeAJ.exe

When I closed it out and returned my saved progress was still there so I'm not sure what trouble itzKiT encountered. 

Excellent Torrent, thank you for sharing!
